data.name: The House Where They Dwell
data.detailed_description:
In this first-person action thriller, play as the hosts of a popular ghost hunting show that is normally staged for views as they discover that this house is truly filled with horrors. Explore a randomly generated mansion, find items to aid you, and kill the spiders infesting the area as you fight to escape The House Where They Dwell.

EXPLORE THE MANSION

Explore a randomly generated mansion as you collect items to aid you against the mysterious spider infestation!

KILL SPIDERS

Watch out! Spiders will increase in size until they are large enough to attack you. Shrink them back down with "SpiderX" Spray and schmack them when they are small enough!

DESTROY SPIDER NESTS

Watch out for spider nests throughout the house, they seem to be where the spiders are coming from. Luckily, you can douse the nests and set them ablaze with "Flickers" lighter fluid and matches!

data.short_description: The House Where They Dwell is a first-person action thriller game from Half Brain Games, LLC. Play as the hosts of a popular ghost hunting show that is normally staged for views and discover for yourself the true horrors that dwell within this mysterious mansion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8650U CPU @ 1.90GHz 2.11 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Recommended:
